name: Volcano of Love: Lava me Long Time
name_original: Volcano of Love: Lava me Long Time
description:
When you're sent to investigate a volcano, it seems like a lot of fun! But shortly after you arrive it begins to erupt...

With no way to escape the island, there's only one way to stop the volcano:

Find 'True Love' and pass the volcano's 3 trials of love!

With 2 girls and a super-hot guy to choose from, surely finding True Love will be easy?! But one girl hates germs, one is way too clingy, and the guy likes getting naked for no reason?!

It's a dating simulator that's hot, hot, hot!

A comedy game, not a serious dating simulator. About 20-30 minutes of gameplay in total. (3 routes, 5-10 extra minutes of gameplay/story per route)
